snippet.title: Bombergrounds: Reborn - Global Release Trailer (version 1.0)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD NOW: https://bombergrounds.com

Welcome to the all-new Bombergrounds: Reborn. This patch will completely overhaul the game. Get ready to be blown away! 

Chaotic and fast-paced Bomber battles like you’ve never seen before! Play with friends and team up together. 

Unlock and upgrade cute animals with powerful abilities to fight in many different game modes! Collect unique skins, make friends, team up and let the battle begin! 

▶▶NEW FEATURES IN BOMBERGROUNDS: REBORN◀◀

👑Game Mode: Battle Royale
A chaotic free-for-all where up to 12 players engage in battle to get the Victory Royale! 

🦆Game Mode: Duck Grab (team mode)
A lovely and chill game mode of 3 versus 3 (team mode). Grab 10 Golden Ducks that your team holds for 10 seconds to win the match. 

💣Game Mode: Team Fight (team mode)
May the best team win! Defeat the opposing team in a Best-of-Three. If you are defeated, you’re out for the round. 

🏅Game Mode: Duel
A classic one-on-one match. Defeat the opposing player to get the W! 

⚡Animal Heroes & Powers
Unlock dozens of cute animals with deadly powers that are simple to use but hard to master. Do you have what it takes to become the best? 

🎲Level up your Animals!
Upgrade your animals to level 10 to have them reach their maximum potential. Check out the game and the daily shop every day to be able to level up your animals faster. 

🎫Bomber Pass
The Bomber Pass is the best way to earn rewards in Bombergrounds. In this system, you’ll be able to earn skins, characters, gems, resources and much more, just by playing!

🏆Trophy Road 
Noobs, look away! This system is for professionals. Win matches to earn trophies, which unlocks cool ranks & exciting loot.

1️⃣Leaderboards
Compete in the leaderboards, both locally and globally. Can you become the best player in your country, or perhaps even in the world?!

OTHER NEW CHANGES IN BG: REBORN
- Full reset of all progress!
- 12 New Maps!
- 28 New Ranks (Bronze to Grandmaster)
- Daily Rewards (free)
- Fully upgraded skinis (all of them! enjoy your new looks!)
- New Visuals (Animations, Textures, Models)
- New Party System
- New Friend System
- Localization
- Creator Boost Support
- Gigantic Duck ID Support
and much, much more!

🛑 Note to old accounts/players
Old accounts will keep their cosmetics, characters and emojis they received during the era of Bombergrounds: Battle Royale (originally released in 2020). Once the patch is live, you will be able to utilize your Bombergrounds items in the new version of the game.

Links
Discord: https://discord.gg/bombergrounds
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bombergrounds
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bombergrounds
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bombergrounds
Website: https://bombergrounds.com/
Terms of Service: https://giganticduck.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://giganticduck.com/privacy-policy/
Support: https://support.giganticduck.com
